item.title: Set up Dour-Handed with Active Effects
item.author: throdo.proudfoot@gmail.com (Throdo Proudfoot)
item.description: Dour-Handed is a starting virtue common to all the culture. It gives 2 bonuses +1 damage to Heavy Blow +1 to feat die for each Pierce (combat special damage for swords, bows and spears) Pay attention that in the Alpha release of the pdf rule it was like that, the pierce bonus wasn’t present ! Warning : This tutorial is compatible with Tor2e v2.0.7 and more. Create the Virtue First step create the Dour-Handed virtue with value and description.

item.title: Active Effect for Piercing Blow
item.author: throdo.proudfoot@gmail.com (Throdo Proudfoot)
item.description: Lots of systems, having an item (magical or not) can modify the characteristics of a Hero or an Adversary. In Foundry VTT, it is possible to have this automation using Active Effect. In this article I will show you how to automate the modification of the Piercing Blow modification using a keen Weapon (Reward). I will tell you how to do it, how it is working and also what is the limitation (TOR2e system).
item.dc:creator: Throdo Proudfoot
